title: Wand Wielder
requirement: Score 100 goals using only magical ricochets
description: Youve harnessed the power of the enchanted paddle, guiding the ball with the finesse of a sorcerer

title: Bouncing Broomstick
requirement: Score 5 points in a single match without letting the ball touch the boarders
description: You've taken flight on a virtual broomstick keeping the ball afloat with your wizardry skills

title: Borderline Maestro
requirement: Score 50 strict shot goals without letting the ball touch the boarders
description: Your precision is unparalleled as you navigate the game without a single touch to the edges. a true maestro of the ping pong realm

title: Rebound Ruler
requirement: Achieve 25 rebounded goals, mastering the art of utilizing boarders to your advantage
description: You've harnessed the unpredictable power of rebounds, turning them into calculated goals that leave opponents puzzled

title: Tournament Triumph
description: You stand as the undisputed champion, conquering tournament after tournament with unmatched skill and determination

title: Sorcerer's Apprentice
requirement: Play 10 matches without losing a single one
description: The magical forces are strong with you, and your opponents are left wondering if you've made a pact with a game genie

title: Starstruck
requirement: Collect 100 stars in total across all games played
description: You've become the true celestial champion, gathering stars with every swing of your magical paddle

title: Clean Sheet Connoisseur
description: Your defensive skills are legendary, keeping opponents at bay and maintaining a spotless record in multiple matches

title: Successive Shutouts
requirement: Achieve 5 successive clean sheets in a row
description: You've created an impenetrable wall, shutting out opponents in three consecutive matches with flawless defensive play

title: Tournament Trailblazer
requirement: Win a tournament without conceding a single point
description: You've left a trail of defeated opponentsin your wake, dominating every match in a tournament without conceding a single point
